title: MIL-STD Rocket Engine Control & Measurement System (Capstone)
description: A fully instrumented rocket engine test stand designed for MIL-STD compliance, enabling safe, repeatable, and standards-driven engine testing. Integrates automated thrust measurement, combustion chamber sensing, mass flow control, and ignition sequencing through a modular control and data acquisition system.

title: Socially Assistive Robot – ESP32 Heart Monitor (IoT)
description: IoT-enabled biometric monitoring system using an ESP32 microcontroller to collect heart rate and temperature data for socially assistive robotics. Streams live vitals to a cloud dashboard through Blynk, supporting remote health insights and emotion-responsive interaction.

title: RoboRacer Autonomous Race Car (ROS2 + LiDAR)
description: ROS2-based autonomous vehicle capable of real-time LiDAR mapping, sensor fusion, and path planning on a Jetson Orin platform. Implements modular perception and control nodes for high-speed navigation and obstacle avoidance in dynamic environments.

title: Deployable Disaster Alert System (ESP32 + FastAPI)
description: Distributed environmental sensing network using ESP32 sensor nodes (ESP-NOW) that stream to a FastAPI backend, which ingests CSV data and publishes a web dashboard for localized alerting.

title: IEEE Region 5 Student Ethics Competition (3rd Place)
description: Argued ethical responses to engineering scenarios involving public safety and professional responsibility; delivered a concise IEEE Ethical standards-aligned rationale and handled judge Q&A.

title: Portfolio Website (Self-Hosted on Raspberry Pi 4)
description: Designed and deployed a self-hosted portfolio website on a Raspberry Pi 4 using Astro and Nginx. Automated deployment through Git and built for speed, reliability, and full control

title: Pioneer for Cheniere — Didion Milling Crisis (2nd Place)
description: Competition case analysis of the Didion Milling explosion focusing on process safety, dust hazard analysis, and prevention strategies. Built a structured root-cause analysis and presented mitigation plans under time constraints.
